creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description:
Panel of L'ossu depicting the Taoist Immortal, Han Hsiang Tzu, with his emblem, the flute.  He wears a yellowish green coat woven with gold, pale flesh trousers, and a blue cap.  Mountainous landscape in shades of blue, green, brown, tan, yellow, and brick-red.  At upper right the peach tree from with he fell.
Former Classification: Textiles - Tapestry
title: Panel Fragment
